product_name: The North Face Shavasana Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A slimming pair of moisture-wicking, quick-dyring yoga pants, The North Face Shavasana Pants for women offer highly supportive fabric that won't wrinkle, shrink or fade over time. Contoured mid-rise waistband is higher in the back and dips in the front to eliminate the potential for muffin top. Shaped waistband allows you to bend forward comfortably without fabric digging into your abs. Seamed construction on the thighs and calves shows off your well-honed technique. Tuck a studio pass or cash into the hidden key pocket for safekeeping. Closeout.
short_description: A slimming pair of moisture-wicking, quick-dyring yoga pants, The North Face Shavasana Pants for women offer highly supportive fabric that won't wrinkle, shrink or fade over time.
